verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is filthy <S%H4754><s%> and polluted <S%H1351><s%>, to the oppressing <S%H3238><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>!

She obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%>; she received <S%H3947><s%> not correction <S%H4148><s%>; she trusted <S%H982><s%> not in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; she drew not near <S%H7126><s%> to her God <S%H430><s%>.

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> inside <S%H7130><s%> her are roaring <S%H7580><s%> lions <S%H738><s%>; her judges <S%H8199><s%> are evening <S%H6153><s%> wolves <S%H2061><s%>; they gnaw and break the bones <S%H1633><s%> until the morrow <S%H1242><s%>.

Her prophets <S%H5030><s%> are light <S%H6348><s%> and treacherous <S%H900><s%> persons <S%H582><s%>: her priests <S%H3548><s%> have polluted <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, they have done violence <S%H2554><s%> to the law <S%H8451><s%>.

The just <S%H6662><s%> Lord <S%H3068><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> there <S%H6213><s%>; he will not do iniquity <S%H5766><s%>: every <S%H1242><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> does he bring <S%H5414><s%> his judgment <S%H4941><s%> to light <S%H216><s%>, he fails <S%H5737><s%> not <S%H5767><s%>; but the unjust knows <S%H3045><s%> no shame <S%H1322><s%>.

I have cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>: their towers <S%H6438><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%>; I made their streets <S%H2351><s%> waste <S%H2717><s%>, that no one passes by <S%H5674><s%>: their cities <S%H5892><s%> are destroyed <S%H6658><s%>, so that there is no man <S%H376><s%>, that there is no inhabitant <S%H3427><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%>, Surely you will fear <S%H3372><s%> me <S%H3947><s%>, you will receive instruction <S%H4148><s%>; so their living <S%H4583><s%> should not be cut off <S%H3772><s%>, howsoever <S%H834><s%> I punished <S%H6485><s%> them <S%H403><s%>: but they rose early <S%H7925><s%>, and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> all their doings <S%H5949><s%>.

Therefore wait <S%H2442><s%> upon me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, until the day <S%H3117><s%> that I rise up <S%H6965><s%> to the prey <S%H5706><s%>: for my determination <S%H4941><s%> is to gather <S%H622><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, that I may assemble <S%H6908><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, to pour <S%H8210><s%> upon them my indignation <S%H2195><s%>, even all my fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>: for all the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

For then will I return <S%H2015><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> a pure <S%H1305><s%> language <S%H8193><s%>, that they may all call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%> him with one <S%H259><s%> consent <S%H7926><s%>.

From beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> my suppliants <S%H6282><s%>, even the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my dispersed <S%H6327><s%>, shall bring <S%H2986><s%> my offering <S%H4503><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall you not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> for all your doings <S%H5949><s%>, where you have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me <S%H5493><s%>: for then I will take away out of the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you them that rejoice <S%H5947><s%> in your pride <S%H1346><s%>, and you shall no more <S%H3254><s%> be haughty <S%H1361><s%> because of my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

I will also leave <S%H7604><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you an afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and poor <S%H1800><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and they shall trust <S%H2620><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not do <S%H6213><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, nor speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>; neither shall a deceitful <S%H8649><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>: for they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> and lie down <S%H7257><s%>, and none shall make them afraid <S%H2729><s%>.

Sing <S%H7442><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; shout <S%H7321><s%>, O Israel <S%H3478><s%>; be glad <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> with all the heart <S%H3820><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has taken away <S%H5493><s%> your judgments <S%H4941><s%>, he has cast out <S%H6437><s%> your enemy <S%H341><s%>: the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you <S%H7200><s%>: you shall not see evil any more <S%H7451><s%>.
In that day <S%H3117><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> you not <S%H6726><s%>: and to Zion, Let not your hands <S%H3027><s%> be slack <S%H7503><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you is mighty <S%H1368><s%>; he will save <S%H3467><s%>, he will rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over you with joy <S%H8057><s%>; he will rest <S%H2790><s%> in his love <S%H160><s%>, he will joy <S%H1523><s%> over you with singing <S%H7440><s%>.
I will gather <S%H622><s%> them that are sorrowful <S%H3013><s%> for the solemn assembly <S%H4150><s%>, who are of you <S%H2781><s%>, to whom the reproach of it was a burden <S%H4864><s%>.

Behold <S%H6256><s%>, at that time I will undo <S%H6213><s%> all that afflict <S%H6031><s%> you <S%H3467><s%>: and I will save her that limps <S%H6760><s%>, and gather <S%H6908><s%> her that was driven out <S%H5080><s%>; and I will get <S%H7760><s%> them praise <S%H8416><s%> and fame <S%H8034><s%> in every land <S%H776><s%> where they have been put to shame <S%H1322><s%>.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> you again <S%H6256><s%>, even in the time that I gather <S%H6908><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>: for I will make you a name <S%H8034><s%> and a praise <S%H8416><s%> among all people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, when I turn back <S%H7725><s%> your captivity <S%H7622><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
